Keywords: Deity , Eternal , Past , Warrior
Real Name: Phastos
Special Powers
LEGEND OF THE PAST: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Phastos this turn.
MASTER OF THE FORGE: Super Strength. FREE: KO an object that a friendly character is holding. If you do, choose one: Close Combat Expert, Invulnerability, or Ranged Combat Expert. That character can use the chosen power until your next turn.
AN ARMORY HONED BY MATHEMATICAL PRECISION: UNIQUE MODIFIER: Other friendly characters with the Eternal keyword within 4 squares modify damage +1. // POWER: Generate an object (light or heavy).

December 8, 2021
Goop
Atk is average, defense is kinda low, he's pretty much a 75pt support piece. The amount of extra damage he can give your team is massive though. Giving them CCE or RCE while also granting damage within 4 squares is going to have your team hitting HARD. He's a LOT of extra damage for your team if you can protect him.
